sprint_goal: Provision core AWS infrastructure and establish the CI/CD pipeline foundation.
epic_coverage: Core Infrastructure & DevOps Foundation, Identity & Access Management (IAM)
key_deliverables: Provisioned VPC, EKS, RDS, and Redis. Foundational CI workflow. Dockerfiles for all services. Initial IAM database schema and backend/frontend skeletons.
demo_objectives: Show Terraform code provisioning AWS resources. Demonstrate a successful CI pipeline run in GitHub Actions. Show the registration UI locally.
success_criteria: All core infrastructure is provisioned via Terraform. The CI pipeline can successfully build, test, and scan a service. Developers can run the application locally via Docker Compose.
risk_factors: Delays in AWS provisioning; complexity of EKS and CI/CD setup.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize a 'minimum viable infrastructure'. Use established Terraform modules. Begin local development in parallel using Docker Compose.
external_dependencies: AWS account access with correct permissions.
burndown_target: Complete all DevOps tasks to unblock future sprints.

sprint_goal: Deploy a fully functional Identity & Access Management (IAM) service. Users can register, verify email, log in, and log out.
epic_coverage: Core Infrastructure & DevOps Foundation, Identity & Access Management (IAM)
key_deliverables: A fully automated CD pipeline to a staging EKS cluster. A deployed IAM service supporting the full registration-to-logout lifecycle. E2E test suite for IAM.
demo_objectives: A live demo of a user registering via the UI, receiving a verification email, clicking the link, logging in successfully, and then logging out, invalidating their session.
success_criteria: A merge to the main branch automatically deploys the IAM service to staging. The full user lifecycle can be completed in the staging environment.
risk_factors: Integration issues between services in the new EKS environment. CI/CD pipeline instability.
mitigation_strategies: Implement comprehensive health checks and logging from day one. Allocate DevOps time for pipeline support.
